intro: Strategic data scientist with deep quantitative expertise and full-lifecycle experience in data product development—from problem framing and MVP creation to production deployment and monitoring. Experienced in fast-growing tech environments like Vinted, I've partner closely with senior and cross-functional stakeholders to turn complex challenges into scalable, value-generating solutions.

roles.title: Senior Decision Scientist - Marketplace Strategy team
bullets: Owned marketplace performance reporting (KPIs, dashboards, OKRs); critically reviewing the accuracy and relevancy of the metrics on which we report. Built and maintained dbt models and SQL ELT pipelines.

Partnered with C‑level stakeholders to shape marketplace strategy and investment decisions; delivered decision support through opportunity and market sizing (e.g. strategic decision to launch new categories on Vinted).

roles.title: Intern / Analyst / Associate - Data Scientist
bullets: Performed data analysis, interviews and storylining in a strategic project for a 9bn international fashion company to reduce the number of SKUs in their collection.
Presenter, creator and curator of a Data Science Best Practices course for starting data scientists. Course is part of the Metyis Academy, given in Porto.

Led the development of a network optimization for depots and trucks of a gas company in the USA, using linear optimization. Savings were presented to the board and an execution program has started in 2024.
Created a demand forecasting module using Facebook Prophet for a company in the food and vegetable industry. The product currently runs in production on Microsoft Azure.
Created a product mapping algorithm for the commercial team of a Madrid-based international fashion company. The algorithm was integrated in a Streamlit-based web app for end-user access.

roles.title: Intern Data Scientist
bullets: Built a clustering algorithm which extracted rooftops, angle and orientation from satellite data.
Integrated the algorithm into their Python Django back-end infrastructure.
